comments:

error. )

'Save could not be completed.
Error during build.' After I click on the details button the following is 
displayed.

'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.compiler.ast.FieldDeclaration'

Although error says 'Errors During build' there is no error in the source
file.

I do not know what caused this. I could not send you the source codes because 
of our company's security restrictions.
